de.hsa.jam.util
Class jAMUtils

java.lang.Object
  de.hsa.jam.util.jAMUtils

public class jAMUtils
extends java.lang.Object

jAM helper class
There are digital signal processing utils, some math utils and some other utils like printing a vector etc.

Author:
Michael Wager
